SEARCH
Package net.minecraftforge.common.util

Interface LazyFunction<T,R>

Type Parameters:
T - The type of the value
All Superinterfaces:
Function<T,R>
All Known Implementing Classes:
LazyFunction.Concurrent, LazyFunction.Fast
public sealed interface LazyFunction<T,R> extends Function<T,R> permits LazyFunction.Fast<T,R>, LazyFunction.Concurrent<T,R>
Proxy object for a value that is calculated on first access
